body_html: There's a new version of the setup guide for compiling TensorFlow with ComputeCpp, Codeplay's implementation of SYCL, so that OpenCL devices can be used. We would appreciate any feedback you can give us on it. https://www.codeplay.com/products/computesuite/computecpp/guides/how-to-setup-tensorflow-with-computecpp
